name: Morse (aacheng)
description:
Reminiscent of phone games, simple and endless.

Click when the cursor is at the front of a bar. Release when the cursor is at the back of the bar. Your time window to click is around 1/10-1/15 of a second. Get the pink dots for bonus points.

Made with GameMaker Studio 1.4 for a personal challenge. Just wanted to see how quickly I could make something simple.
